mapper.sql: UUID, CREATETIME, CHECKTIME, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, TYPE, CREATER, CHECKER, STARTER, ENDER, SUPPLIERUUID, TOTALMONEY, STATE, WAYBILLSN
mapper.insert: insert into orders (UUID, CREATETIME, CHECKTIME, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, TYPE, CREATER, CHECKER, STARTER, ENDER, SUPPLIERUUID, TOTALMONEY, STATE, WAYBILLSN) values (#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{checktime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{starttime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creater,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{checker,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{starter,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{supplieruuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalmoney,jdbcType=REAL}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{waybillsn,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update orders
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE},
CHECKTIME = #{checktime,jdbcType=DATE},
STARTTIME = #{starttime,jdbcType=DATE},
ENDTIME = #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CHECKER = #{checker,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STARTER = #{starter,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ENDER = #{ender,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SUPPLIERUUID = #{supplieruuid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TOTALMONEY = #{totalmoney,jdbcType=REAL},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAYBILLSN = #{waybillsn,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update orders set CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE}, CHECKTIME = #{checktime,jdbcType=DATE}, STARTTIME = #{starttime,jdbcType=DATE}, ENDTIME = #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CHECKER = #{checker,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STARTER = #{starter,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ENDER = #{ender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SUPPLIERUUID = #{supplieruuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TOTALMONEY = #{totalmoney,jdbcType=REAL}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAYBILLSN = #{waybillsn,jdbcType=INTEGER} where UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
